lead_paragraph: GORDON--Marjorie. Passed away on December 8, 2015. A kind and generous person with a great sense of humor, she was devoted to her many friends and students. She taught at many universities and music camps, and was the founder of the Detroit Opera Theater, the Detroit Piccolo Opera, and co-founded "Adventures in Music" for the Detroit Public School system. She made her operatic debut with the New York Philharmonic, and went on to sing with the best orchestras in the country. She gave recitals with her violist husband, Nathan Gordon in Greece, Europe, Canada, and Israel. She was a member of many musical organizations, including the Florida Music Teachers Association, the National Teachers Association, and the Broward County Music Club. She left one child, Peter Gordon and three grandchildren, Ted and Josh Gordon and Douglas Schwartz. 1/3
